description:
Willis has a very dry sense of humor. He comes across as being very conservative, so when he cracks a joke (which he does a lot) you have to stop and think for a second... is he being serious?
But once I became familiar with his humor, I found myself constantly entertained!
Willis is also a musician and he plays a variety of instruments. That also surprised me. With his banker haircut, I really wasn’t expecting anyone so bohemian!
He also had a nice little surprise under his clothes. He’s pretty ripped, with a nice chest, defined abs, and muscular arms.
I think my favorite part was his dick, though... it’s perfect!
title: Willis
